name: Loaded Cheesy Fries
description: It’s going to be messy and deliciously cheesy! Have extra Big Burger Sauce for dunking.
preparation: Cut potatoes into french fry sticks. Place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss with fry seasoning. Bake for 30 min or until crispy.
Meanwhile, in a bowl, combine sauce mix, mayo, ketchup and relish. Set aside.
Once fries are crispy, sprinkle with cheddar and mozzarella. Let the heat from the fries melt the cheese, or bake for 5 more min.
Drizzle with big burger sauce and add toppings, if using.
tips: Replace crispy bacon with meatless Better Than Bacon Topper.

products.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning
summary: Who can resist restaurant-style cheesy fries? They’re even better when we bake them at home. Made with aromatic garlic, real Parmesan, and premium quality spices, this versatile seasoning is low in sodium, and free from gluten, artificial flavours, colours, and preservatives. Simply sprinkle it on fries, popcorn, pasta, or veggies for a healthy, cheesy family favourite.

products.name: Big Burger Sauce Mix
summary: The tastiest burger sauce on this side of the golden arches. Best of all, it’s free of sodium and preservatives. Simply mix the seasoning with mayo, ketchup, and relish, and you’ve got saucy goodness to slather on burgers, sandwiches, sausages, and hot dogs.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Better Than Bacon Topper
summary: Ok, bacon lovers; we see you. We know that bacon made from ‘pinto beans’ has you feeling a kind of way: Skeptical. But trust us, this fan fave does not disappoint and it’s so easy to use. No need to grab a frying pan — just pop the top and shake on the taste of bacon with way less sodium, zero cholesterol, and no artificial flavours or colours (unlike popular brands). These crunchy bites are layered with smoky bacon flavor and are an amazing addition to salads, potatoes, eggs, and more!
